activities: ProcessMAP offers a hosted Environmental, Health & Safety Management System for Fortune 2000 customers. We store basic user information like username, department, contact info, etc. Our Incident tracking system stores detailed information about the injuries that occur on the plant sites like date & time of incident, incident type and injury type. All of the member data is available to authorized users at the through an online, web-based, interface.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The Company's Consumer Affairs Department has the responsibility for handling third party complaints, access requests and any other third party issues arising under the Safe Harbor. ProcessMAP Corporation will cooperate with EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland for off-line, on-line and human resources data.
